short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds shortcuts to the SoftUni media player

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an unofficial extension that adds several shortcuts to the SoftUni video player.

The shortcuts are as described:
  - Space: Play/Pause the video
  - 'f': Toggle fullscreen
  - 'i': Toggle miniplayer
  - 'c': Copy current timestamp to clipboard
  - 'ctrl + <': Speed down video playback
  - 'ctrl + >': Speed up video playback
